subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The San Diego State senior guard Kelvin Davis, who returned to play while having chemotherapy and radiation treatments for Hodgkin’s lymphoma, is the 2009 recipient of the United States Basketball Writers Association’s Most Courageous award.
snippet: The San Diego State senior guard Kelvin Davis, who returned to play while having chemotherapy and radiation treatments for Hodgkin’s lymphoma, is the 2009 recipient of the United States Basketball Writers Association’s Most Courageous award.
